keyEvents.title: King Punch Devastates Arena
keyEvents.description: Elizabello II's King Punch creates a massive shockwave that illuminates the entire stadium and nearly destroys the fighting ring.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the colosseum's durability in withstanding such devastating attacks.

keyEvents.title: Block B Concludes
keyEvents.description: The Block B battle royale concludes with Bartolomeo as the victor, marking the completion of the second tournament block.
keyEvents.significance: Advances the tournament progression and sets up the remaining blocks and eventual finals.

description: A massive colosseum in Dressrosa hosting a tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi. The arena witnesses intense battles between powerful fighters from across the world.

statusHistory.description: Hosting the tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi

notableFeatures: Large fighting ring with water surrounding it
Underground corridors connecting to various areas
Durable construction that withstands powerful attacks
